content.title: YSR Rythu Bharosa
content.department: Dept. of Agriculture, Govt. of Andhra Pradesh
content.details: Launched in June 2019, the scheme 'YSR RYTHU BHAROSA' is one of the nine navratna welfare schemes. It provides financial assistance to farmer families across the state @ ₹ 13,500/- per farmer family per year. 49 lakh farmer families will benefit from this scheme.
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹ 13,500/- per annum for landholder farmer families.
Three installments of ₹ 7,500, ₹ 4,000, and ₹ 2,000 for eligible landowner farmers.
Financial assistance for landless cultivators belonging to SC, ST, BC, and Minority categories.
Crop insurance premiums paid by the government.
Nine hours of free electricity during daytime for agricultural purposes.
Electricity for aquaculture farmers at ₹ 1.50 per unit.
₹ 3000 crores corpus fund for price stabilization.
₹ 4000 crores for the Natural disaster Relief fund.
Cold storage and food processing units established in constituencies.
Toll Tax and Road Tax waived off for Agriculture Tractors.
₹ 7,00,000 YSR Bima for accidental death or suicide.
eligibility: Landholder farmer families who collectively own cultivable land.
Farmers cultivating under ROFR lands and D Patta Lands.
Farmers cultivating acquired lands for which compensation was not paid.
Joint holding benefits transferred to the family member with the highest landholding.
exclusions: Farmers holding constituency posts as (Ex) & Present Ministers, MPs, MLAs & MLCs.
Superannuated/retired pensioners with a monthly pension of ₹10,000 or more.
Persons who paid Income Tax in the last assessment year.
Persons owning farmlands converted into non-agriculture usage.
Persons paid Commercial Tax/Professional Tax/GST during the last assessment year.
content.application_process: Online application process managed by village volunteers and revenue officials.

faqs.question: When Was The YSR Rythu Bharosa Scheme Launched?
faqs.answer: The scheme 'YSR Rythu Bharosa' was launched in June 2019.

faqs.question: Which Are The Nine Navratna Welfare Schemes?
faqs.answer: 1. YSR Raithu Bharosa 2. Fee reimbursement, Youth Employment & Job Creation 3. Arogyasri 4. YSR Jalayagnam 5. Ban on Alcohol 6. Amma Vodi 7. YSR Asara, YSR Cheyuta 8. Housing for all poor 9. Pensions – Enhancement.
